member.name: D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS
member.summary: Specifies how a bitmap can be used.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS.D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS_NONE
member.summary: The bitmap is created with default properties.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS.D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS_TARGET
member.summary: The bitmap can be used as a device context target.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS.D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS_CANNOT_DRAW
member.summary: The bitmap cannot be used as an input.

member.name: D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS.D2D1_BITMAP_OPTIONS_CPU_READ
member.summary: The bitmap can be read from the CPU.

summary.div: Note This flag is not available in Windows Store apps.
